name: The Second Empire
declaringWar: Your men will fall just at the sight of my cavalry!
attacked: Ha ha ha, we will be very glad to head out to war again.
denounced: You actually seem sharper than what I had originally thought.
introduction: Stranger, welcome to our kingdom! I am Leo.
tradeRequest: My friend, it is my belief that this settlement can benefit both our peoples.
uniques: Each city founded increases Science cost of Technologies [50]% less than normal

name: Kartvel
declaringWar: Your men will fall just at the sight of my cavalry!
attacked: Ha ha ha, we will be very glad to head out to war again.
defeated: I am Kartvel's king. You can take my lands, my people, my kingdom, but you will never break our spirits.
denounced: You actually seem sharper than what I had originally thought.
introduction: Stranger, welcome to our kingdom! I am Temur.
tradeRequest: My friend, it is my belief that this settlement can benefit both our peoples.
uniques: [+15]% Strength <for [non-[Air]] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

name: Wildmen
attacked: Haha! You'll soon regret messing with us!
defeated: At least let our companions run free.
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [75]% chance>
When defeating a [Barbarian] unit, earn [10] Gold and recruit it <with [67]% chance>
[-75]% Production when constructing [{non-[Beastman]} {Military}] units [in all cities]

name: Revenants
declaringWar: Your flesh shall make an excellent feast.
attacked: Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
defeated: I swear that we will rise again, as we always have.
introduction: Do you feel the cold chill of death in our presence?
tradeRequest: I would be grateful if you agreed on the following proposal.

name: Wyrmfolk
declaringWar: The dragon wants the blood of soldiers!
attacked: Oh well, I presume you know what you're doing.
defeated: It is over. Perhaps now I shall have peace, at last.
introduction: Are you real or a phantom?
tradeRequest: It appears that you do have a reason for existing – to make this deal with me.
uniques: New [Dragon] units start with [15] XP [in all cities]
